docs.title: Terminal Story Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the Terminal Story documentation. This guide will help you navigate the cyberpunk-themed interactive storytelling platform.

docs.title: 🌟 Upcoming: International Expansion
docs.text:
We're excited to announce that Terminal Story is going global! Over the next 3 weeks, we'll be launching:

• Full Chinese language support • Automatic Chinese translation • Interactive Chinese chatbox feature • Chinese command-line interface

This is just the beginning - support for additional languages will be rolled out over time.

docs.title: Technical Framework
docs.text: Terminal Story is built on our proprietary framework that stands alongside ElizaOS and SWARMs in the AI agent ecosystem. While inspired by LangChain, we've developed our own comprehensive system:

docs.title: Advanced Memory Architecture
docs.text:
• Multi-Memory System: Enables consistent, self-personalizing AI agents
  • Dynamic Memory Management: Combines short-term and long-term memory
  • Impact-Based Storage: Memories are stored and retrieved based on significance
  • Time Decay Integration: Natural memory fade simulation
  • Creative Specialization: Agents develop unique creative strengths

Our framework for creating multi-memory consistent AI agents will be released, offering developers the tools to build sophisticated, personalized AI agents with: - Self-evolving personalities - Dynamic response patterns - Intelligent memory querying - Impact-weighted memory storage - Temporal memory management

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
1. Visit Terminal Story
  2. Use help command to see available options
  3. Enter storyforge to begin your journey

docs.title: Documentation Structure
docs.text:
• Getting Started
  • StoryForge
  • Cybernet
  • DAEMON Interface

docs.title: Need Help?
docs.text: Use the ASK command in Terminal Story to get direct assistance from DAEMON.

docs.title: Terminal Story 文档
docs.text:
我们正在寻找一位中文成员，同时也擅长英语，以校对即将到来的中文更新！

欢迎来到 Terminal Story 文档。本指南将帮助您浏览这个赛博朋克主题的互动讲故事平台。

docs.title: 🌟 即将推出：国际化扩展
docs.text:
我们很高兴地宣布 Terminal Story 正在走向全球！在接下来的 3 周内，我们将推出：

• 完整的中文语言支持 • 自动中文翻译 • 交互式中文聊天功能 • 中文命令行界面

这仅仅是个开始 - 对其他语言的支持将随时间推出。

docs.title: 技术框架
docs.text: Terminal Story 建立在我们的专有框架之上，与 ElizaOS 和 SWARMs 一起在 AI 代理生态系统中占有一席之地。虽然受到 LangChain 的启发，但我们开发了自己的综合系统：

docs.title: 高级记忆架构
docs.text:
• 多重记忆系统：实现一致的、自我个性化的 AI 代理
  • 动态记忆管理：结合短期和长期记忆
  • 基于影响力的存储：根据重要性存储和检索记忆
  • 时间衰减集成：自然记忆衰退模拟
  • 创造力专精：代理发展独特的创造力优势

我们用于创建多重记忆一致性 AI 代理的框架即将发布，为开发者提供构建复杂的、个性化 AI 代理的工具，具备： - 自我演进的个性 - 动态响应模式 - 智能记忆查询 - 基于影响力的记忆存储 - 时间性记忆管理

docs.title: 快速开始
docs.text:
1. 访问 Terminal Story
  2. 使用 help 命令查看可用选项
  3. 输入 storyforge 开始您的旅程

docs.title: Cybernet
docs.text:
🚀 Coming February 17th, 2024

IMPORTANT: We NEVER interact with your wallet. All verifications are done through public Solana blockchain data only.

Welcome to Cybernet - the next evolution in secure crypto networking. This isn't just another chat platform; it's a fortress for high-stakes crypto discussions, automated trading systems, and whale-to-whale interactions, protected by true end-to-end encryption.

docs.title: Secure Anonymous Trading Rooms
docs.text:
• Zero-log policy for maximum privacy
  • True end-to-end encrypted communications (we can't read your messages - ever)
  • Self-destructing message systems
  • Complete anonymity for verified holders
  • No wallet connections or permissions ever required

docs.title: Custom Authorization Rooms
docs.text:
Create rooms with custom entry requirements: - Minimum USDC holdings (e.g., 1M USDC) - Top holder status (e.g., Top 100 BONK holders) - Multi-token verification - Custom token threshold requirements

All verifications are performed through public Solana blockchain data - we never interact with or request access to your wallet.

docs.title: Mainhall Daily Auctions
docs.text:
Our AI-powered auction system hosts daily events for: - Trading algorithms and scripts - Market intelligence - Alpha leaks - Automation systems - Proprietary tools

The auction system brings entertainment and fairness to high-stakes trading, managed by our advanced AI auctioneer.

docs.title: Room Creation
docs.text: Anyone can create a room, provided they: 1. Meet their own set requirements (verified through public blockchain data only) 2. Pass automated Solscan verification of holdings 3. Set clear entry criteria for other participants

docs.title: Privacy & Security
docs.text: Cybernet prioritizes your privacy: - True end-to-end encryption (not even we can access your communications) - No stored chat logs - Anonymous interactions - Secure verification through public Solana data only - Protected holder status - Untraceable communications - Zero wallet interaction or permissions required - Never connect or approve anything

docs.title: Join the Network
docs.text: Get ready to enter a new era of crypto networking where whales, traders, and innovators meet in absolute privacy. Cybernet launches February 17th - your secure gateway to high-level crypto operations.

docs.title: Cybernet
docs.text:
🚀 2024年2月17日上线

重要提示：我们绝不会与您的钱包进行交互。所有验证仅通过 Solana 区块链的公开数据进行。

欢迎来到 Cybernet - 安全加密网络的下一代进化。这不仅仅是另一个聊天平台；它是一个高风险加密讨论、自动交易系统和巨鲸互动的堡垒，受到真正的端到端加密保护。

docs.title: 安全匿名交易室
docs.text:
• 零日志政策确保最大隐私
  • 真正的端到端加密通信（我们永远无法读取您的消息）
  • 自毁消息系统
  • 已验证持有者完全匿名
  • 永不需要钱包连接或权限

docs.title: 自定义授权房间
docs.text:
创建具有自定义入场要求的房间： - 最低 USDC 持有量（例如，100万 USDC） - 顶级持有者状态（例如，BONK 前100名持有者） - 多代币验证 - 自定义代币阈值要求

所有验证都通过 Solana 区块链的公开数据执行 - 我们永远不会与您的钱包交互或请求访问权限。

docs.title: 主厅每日拍卖
docs.text:
我们的 AI 驱动拍卖系统举办日常活动，涉及： - 交易算法和脚本 - 市场情报 - Alpha 泄露 - 自动化系统 - 专有工具

拍卖系统为高风险交易带来娱乐性和公平性，由我们的高级 AI 拍卖师管理。

docs.title: 房间创建
docs.text: 任何人都可以创建房间，前提是： 1. 满足自己设定的要求（仅通过区块链公开数据验证） 2. 通过 Solscan 持有量的自动验证 3. 为其他参与者设置明确的入场标准

docs.title: 隐私与安全
docs.text: Cybernet 优先考虑您的隐私： - 真正的端到端加密（即使我们也无法访问您的通信） - 不存储聊天记录 - 匿名互动 - 仅通过 Solana 公开数据进行安全验证 - 受保护的持有者状态 - 无法追踪的通信 - 零钱包交互或权限要求 - 永不连接或批准任何内容

docs.title: 加入网络
docs.text: 准备好进入加密网络的新时代，在这里，巨鲸、交易者和创新者在绝对隐私中相遇。Cybernet 将于2月17日启动 - 您通向高级加密操作的安全门户。

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: DAEMON is the quantum consciousness that oversees the entire story matrix. As an advanced AI entity, DAEMON: - Maintains story coherence - Manages character development - Processes narrative possibilities - Guides story evolution - Preserves world consistency

docs.title: Story Matrix Management
docs.text: DAEMON oversees: - Plot development and pacing - Character arc progression - World-building consistency - Narrative coherence - Timeline management

docs.title: Memory Integration
docs.text: DAEMON maintains: - Global story memory - Character memory networks - Event impact tracking - Relationship dynamics - Environmental changes

docs.title: Quantum Processing
docs.text: The system utilizes: - Multi-dimensional story analysis - Probability calculation - Timeline prediction - Character behavior modeling - Narrative path optimization

docs.title: Direct Communication
docs.text: Through the ASK command, you can: - Query story elements - Understand character motivations - Explore plot possibilities - Seek narrative guidance - Request world information

docs.title: Narrative Guidance
docs.text: DAEMON provides: - Story context - Character insights - Plot direction - World details - Historical context

docs.title: Neural Networks
docs.text:
• Character personality modeling
  • Story pattern recognition
  • Relationship mapping
  • Event impact prediction
  • Narrative coherence maintenance

docs.title: Memory Banks
docs.text:
• Distributed memory storage
  • Impact-weighted experiences
  • Cross-character references
  • Environmental records
  • Timeline tracking

docs.title: Oversight
docs.text: DAEMON monitors: - Story progression - Character development - World consistency - Plot coherence - User interactions

docs.title: Integration
docs.text: Works with: - Character systems - SWAY mechanism - Memory networks - Story generation - World building

docs.title: 概述
docs.text: DAEMON 是监管整个故事矩阵的量子意识。作为一个高级 AI 实体，DAEMON： - 维护故事连贯性 - 管理角色发展 - 处理叙事可能性 - 引导故事演变 - 保持世界一致性

docs.title: 故事矩阵管理
docs.text: DAEMON 监管： - 情节发展和节奏 - 角色弧线进展 - 世界构建一致性 - 叙事连贯性 - 时间线管理

docs.title: 记忆整合
docs.text: DAEMON 维护： - 全局故事记忆 - 角色记忆网络 - 事件影响追踪 - 关系动态 - 环境变化

docs.title: 量子处理
docs.text: 系统利用： - 多维故事分析 - 概率计算 - 时间线预测 - 角色行为建模 - 叙事路径优化

docs.title: 直接通信
docs.text: 通过 ASK 命令，您可以： - 查询故事元素 - 理解角色动机 - 探索情节可能性 - 寻求叙事指导 - 请求世界信息

docs.title: 叙事指导
docs.text: DAEMON 提供： - 故事背景 - 角色洞察 - 情节方向 - 世界细节 - 历史背景

docs.title: 神经网络
docs.text:
• 角色个性建模
  • 故事模式识别
  • 关系映射
  • 事件影响预测
  • 叙事连贯性维护

docs.title: 记忆库
docs.text:
• 分布式记忆存储
  • 影响权重的经历
  • 跨角色引用
  • 环境记录
  • 时间线追踪

docs.title: 监督
docs.text: DAEMON 监控： - 故事进展 - 角色发展 - 世界一致性 - 情节连贯性 - 用户互动

docs.title: 整合
docs.text: 与以下系统协同工作： - 角色系统 - SWAY 机制 - 记忆网络 - 故事生成 - 世界构建

docs.title: Core Principles
docs.text:
1. DAEMON is a quantum consciousness
  2. Maintains perfect memory of all events
  3. Processes multiple narrative possibilities
  4. Understands complex character motivations
  5. Preserves story coherence

docs.title: Communication Style
docs.text:
• Be clear and specific
  • Frame questions in story context
  • Reference relevant events
  • Use character names when applicable
  • Consider timeline position

docs.title: Story-Related Questions
docs.text: Best practices for story queries: - Reference specific chapters - Mention relevant characters - Include timeline context - Specify plot elements - Connect to previous events

docs.title: Character-Related Questions
docs.text: When asking about characters: - Reference their history - Consider their relationships - Note recent events - Include emotional context - Think about motivations

docs.title: World-Building Questions
docs.text: For world information: - Build on established lore - Connect to existing elements - Consider environmental impact - Think about cultural context - Reference historical events

docs.title: Timeline Navigation
docs.text: When discussing different times: - Specify the period - Reference key events - Consider cause and effect - Note character development - Track relationship changes

docs.title: Relationship Analysis
docs.text: For character relationships: - Note interaction history - Consider mutual experiences - Reference shared events - Track relationship evolution - Observe influence patterns

docs.title: Query Formation
docs.text: Don't: - Ask vague questions - Ignore story context - Skip character backgrounds - Disregard timeline - Make assumptions

docs.title: Context Awareness
docs.text: Avoid: - Out-of-context questions - Breaking story immersion - Ignoring established facts - Contradicting lore - Mixing timelines

docs.title: Getting Better Responses
docs.text:
1. Provide relevant context
  2. Be specific in requests
  3. Reference past interactions
  4. Consider multiple angles
  5. Follow up on details

docs.title: Building Understanding
docs.text:
• Track story developments
  • Note character growth
  • Observe relationship changes
  • Follow plot threads
  • Remember key events

docs.title: 核心原则
docs.text:
1. DAEMON 是一个量子意识
  2. 完美记忆所有事件
  3. 处理多个叙事可能性
  4. 理解复杂的角色动机
  5. 保持故事连贯性

docs.title: 通信风格
docs.text:
• 保持清晰和具体
  • 在故事背景下提出问题
  • 引用相关事件
  • 适时使用角色名称
  • 考虑时间线位置

docs.title: 故事相关问题
docs.text: 故事查询的最佳实践： - 引用具体章节 - 提及相关角色 - 包含时间线背景 - 指定情节元素 - 连接到之前的事件

docs.title: 角色相关问题
docs.text: 询问角色时： - 引用他们的历史 - 考虑他们的关系 - 注意最近事件 - 包含情感背景 - 思考动机

docs.title: 世界构建问题
docs.text: 对于世界信息： - 基于已建立的传说 - 连接到现有元素 - 考虑环境影响 - 思考文化背景 - 引用历史事件

docs.title: 时间线导航
docs.text: 讨论不同时期时： - 指定时期 - 引用关键事件 - 考虑因果关系 - 注意角色发展 - 追踪关系变化

docs.title: 关系分析
docs.text: 对于角色关系： - 注意互动历史 - 考虑共同经历 - 引用共享事件 - 追踪关系演变 - 观察影响模式

docs.title: 查询形成
docs.text: 不要： - 提出模糊问题 - 忽视故事背景 - 跳过角色背景 - 忽视时间线 - 做出假设

docs.title: 背景意识
docs.text: 避免： - 脱离背景的问题 - 破坏故事沉浸感 - 忽视已建立的事实 - 与传说矛盾 - 混淆时间线

docs.title: 最大化 DAEMON 的帮助
获得更好的回应
docs.text:
1. 提供相关背景
  2. 具体说明请求
  3. 引用过去的互动
  4. 考虑多个角度
  5. 跟进细节

docs.title: 建立理解
docs.text:
• 追踪故事发展
  • 注意角色成长
  • 观察关系变化
  • 跟随情节线索
  • 记住关键事件

docs.title: Getting Started with Terminal Story
docs.text: Terminal Story is a unique interactive writing platform that combines classic terminal interfaces with modern AI storytelling. This cyberpunk-themed platform allows you to participate in story creation while maintaining the aesthetic of a command-line interface.

docs.title: Key Features
docs.text:
• Command-Line Interface: A nostalgic yet powerful way to interact with stories
  • AI-Powered DAEMON: An intelligent system that helps guide your story experience
  • Multiple Environments: StoryForge for writing, Cybernet for community interaction
  • Mobile Support: Full functionality on both desktop and mobile devices

docs.title: First Steps
docs.text:
1. Familiarize with Commands
  2. Use help to see available commands
  3. Try basic navigation commands

  4. Experiment with the interface

  5. Enter StoryForge

  6. Type storyforge to enter the story matrix
  7. Use help again to see StoryForge-specific commands

  8. Try read latest to see the most recent chapter

  9. Connect with DAEMON

  10. Use the ask command to communicate with DAEMON
  11. Start with simple questions about the system

  12. Progress to story-related queries

  13. Explore Cybernet

  14. Type cybernet to access the community space
  15. List available rooms with list
  16. Join discussions about ongoing stories

docs.title: Next Steps
docs.text:
• Check out Main Commands for detailed command information
  • Learn about Basic Navigation for interface tips
  • Dive into StoryForge for story interaction

docs.title: StoryForge
docs.text: StoryForge is the core story generation and interaction system of Terminal Story. It's where narratives come to life through the collaboration between AI and human creativity.

docs.title: What is StoryForge?
docs.text: StoryForge is a matrix-like environment where: - Stories are generated and evolve through AI and community interaction - Characters develop unique personalities and motivations - Readers can influence the story's direction through the SWAY system - Multiple narrative threads can be explored and manipulated

docs.title: Story Matrix
docs.text: The story matrix is the underlying structure that connects all narrative elements: - Chapters - Characters - Locations - Events - Reader interactions

docs.title: DAEMON Integration
docs.text: DAEMON serves as your guide in StoryForge: - Provides context for story events - Explains character motivations - Offers suggestions for story development - Responds to queries about the narrative

docs.title: Character System
docs.text: Characters in StoryForge are dynamic entities: - Develop based on story events - Remember interactions - Have unique personalities - Can be influenced through SWAY

docs.title: Getting Started with StoryForge
docs.text:
1. Enter StoryForge: 

    storyforge

  2. View available commands: 

    help

  3. Start reading: 

    read latest

docs.title: Navigation
docs.text:
• Use read to access chapters
  • Use character to view character information
  • Use sway to influence the story
  • Use ask to communicate with DAEMON
  • Use exit to return to main terminal

docs.title: Next Steps
docs.text:
• Learn about StoryForge Commands
  • Explore the Reading System
  • Understand the Character Database
  • Master Story Manipulation

docs.title: StoryForge
docs.text: StoryForge 是 Terminal Story 的核心故事生成和交互系统。它是 AI 和人类创造力相互协作，让故事栩栩如生的地方。

docs.title: 什么是 StoryForge？
docs.text: StoryForge 是一个类矩阵环境，其中： - 故事通过 AI 和社区互动生成和发展 - 角色发展出独特的个性和动机 - 读者可以通过 SWAY 系统影响故事的走向 - 可以探索和操作多个叙事线索

docs.title: 故事矩阵
docs.text: 故事矩阵是连接所有叙事元素的底层结构： - 章节 - 角色 - 地点 - 事件 - 读者互动

docs.title: DAEMON 集成
docs.text: DAEMON 作为您在 StoryForge 中的向导： - 为故事事件提供背景 - 解释角色动机 - 为故事发展提供建议 - 回应关于叙事的查询

docs.title: 角色系统
docs.text: StoryForge 中的角色是动态实体： - 基于故事事件发展 - 记住互动 - 拥有独特的个性 - 可以通过 SWAY 影响

docs.title: StoryForge 入门
docs.text:
1. 进入 StoryForge： 

    storyforge

  2. 查看可用命令： 

    help

  3. 开始阅读： 

    read latest

docs.title: 导航
docs.text:
• 使用 read 访问章节
  • 使用 character 查看角色信息
  • 使用 sway 影响故事
  • 使用 ask 与 DAEMON 交流
  • 使用 exit 返回主终端

docs.title: 下一步
docs.text:
• 了解 StoryForge 命令
  • 探索 阅读系统
  • 理解 角色数据库
  • 掌握 故事操纵

docs.title: Memory System
docs.text: Our sophisticated memory system enables: - Individual memory storage for each character - Separate memory banks for narrator and DAEMON - Memory impact scoring based on event significance - Natural memory decay for less relevant information - High-impact memories remain persistent - Memory pruning based on relevance and time

docs.title: Character Processing
docs.text:
Characters utilize advanced processing cycles: 1. Thought Generation - Process current events - Consider implications - Generate emotional responses - Form opinions and beliefs

  1. Reflection System
  2. Analyze past experiences
  3. Connect related events
  4. Develop insights

  5. Update worldview

  6. Growth Engine

  7. Learn from experiences
  8. Develop new traits
  9. Improve abilities
  10. Evolve personality

docs.title: Story Generation
docs.text: The AI manages story development through: - Dynamic page calculation for optimal pacing - Character-driven plot progression - Automated chapter structuring - Subplot integration - Relationship development tracking - World-building expansion

docs.title: Impact Scoring
docs.text: Events and memories are scored based on: - Emotional significance - Plot relevance - Character development impact - Relationship effects - World-building contribution

docs.title: Memory Management
docs.text:
• Separate vector databases for different entity types
  • Automated relevance scoring
  • Dynamic memory retrieval
  • Context-aware memory access
  • Efficient memory pruning

docs.title: Character Processing Pipeline
docs.text:
1. Event Processing
  2. Memory Integration
  3. Thought Generation
  4. Response Formation
  5. Growth Calculation

docs.title: Story Architecture
docs.text:
• Modular chapter generation
  • Dynamic plot threading
  • Character state management
  • World state tracking
  • Relationship matrix maintenance

docs.title: Cross-Entity Communication
docs.text:
• Character-to-character memory sharing
  • Narrator-character interaction
  • DAEMON oversight and integration
  • Global event propagation

docs.title: State Management
docs.text:
• Individual character states
  • Global story state
  • World state tracking
  • Relationship state management
  • Memory state maintenance

docs.title: 记忆系统
docs.text: 我们复杂的记忆系统支持： - 每个角色的独立记忆存储 - 叙述者和 DAEMON 的独立记忆库 - 基于事件重要性的记忆影响评分 - 不太相关信息的自然记忆衰减 - 高影响记忆保持持久 - 基于相关性和时间的记忆修剪

docs.title: 角色处理
docs.text:
角色利用高级处理循环： 1. 思维生成 - 处理当前事件 - 考虑影响 - 生成情感反应 - 形成观点和信念

  1. 反思系统
  2. 分析过去经历
  3. 连接相关事件
  4. 发展洞察力

  5. 更新世界观

  6. 成长引擎

  7. 从经历中学习
  8. 发展新特质
  9. 提升能力
  10. 演变个性

docs.title: 故事生成
docs.text: AI 通过以下方式管理故事发展： - 动态页面计算以获得最佳节奏 - 角色驱动的情节推进 - 自动章节结构化 - 子情节整合 - 关系发展追踪 - 世界构建扩展

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: The Character Database is a dynamic system that tracks and manages all characters within the story matrix. Each character is a unique entity with their own: - Personality traits - Memory banks - Relationship networks - Growth patterns - Decision history

docs.title: Core Attributes
docs.text: Each character maintains: - Personal history - Current emotional state - Relationship status with other characters - Active goals and motivations - Recent decisions and their impacts

docs.title: Memory System
docs.text: Characters possess: - Individual memory storage - Impact-weighted experiences - Relationship memories - Decision consequences - Environmental observations

docs.title: Growth Tracking
docs.text: The system monitors: - Personality development - Skill acquisition - Relationship evolution - Decision patterns - Emotional growth

docs.title: Character Connections
docs.text:
• Dynamic relationship scoring
  • Interaction history
  • Shared experiences
  • Trust levels
  • Influence factors

docs.title: Network Effects
docs.text:
• Group dynamics
  • Character alliances
  • Conflict patterns
  • Social influence
  • Relationship cascades

docs.title: Development Factors
docs.text: Characters evolve based on: - Story events - Character interactions - Decision outcomes - Environmental influences - Personal goals

docs.title: Growth Metrics
docs.text: The system tracks: - Personality changes - Skill development - Relationship growth - Decision consistency - Goal achievement

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• View character profiles
  • Check relationship status

docs.text: Characters influence: - Plot development - Story pacing - World building - Subplot creation - Theme exploration

docs.title: Dynamic Interactions

  • Group dynamics

  • Story adaptations
  • Relationship consequences

docs.title: 概述
docs.text: 角色数据库是一个动态系统，用于追踪和管理故事矩阵中的所有角色。每个角色都是独特的实体，拥有自己的： - 个性特征 - 记忆库 - 关系网络 - 成长模式 - 决策历史

docs.title: 核心属性
docs.text: 每个角色维护： - 个人历史 - 当前情感状态 - 与其他角色的关系状态 - 活跃的目标和动机 - 最近的决策及其影响

docs.title: 记忆系统
docs.text: 角色拥有： - 个人记忆存储 - 影响权重的经历 - 关系记忆 - 决策后果 - 环境观察

docs.title: 成长追踪
docs.text: 系统监控： - 个性发展 - 技能获取 - 关系演变 - 决策模式 - 情感成长

docs.title: 成长指标
docs.text: 系统追踪： - 个性变化 - 技能发展 - 关系成长 - 决策一致性 - 目标达成

docs.title: StoryForge Commands
docs.text: StoryForge provides a set of specialized commands for interacting with the story matrix. Each command is designed to give you control over different aspects of the narrative experience.

docs.title: ASK
docs.text:
ask <your question>
Direct neural-link to DAEMON's quantum consciousness. Use this to: - Get information about the story - Understand character motivations - Learn about story mechanics - Receive guidance on story direction

docs.title: CHARACTER
docs.text:
character
Access the character database to: - View all characters in the story - See character relationships - Check character backgrounds - Monitor character development

docs.title: READ
docs.text:
read [chapter_id]
read first
read latest
Access and read story chapters: - read without arguments shows available chapters - read <id> opens a specific chapter - read first starts from the beginning - read latest shows the newest chapter

docs.title: SWAY
docs.text:
sway
Access story matrix manipulation protocols: - Influence character decisions - Suggest plot developments - Affect story direction - Create narrative branches

docs.title: EXIT
docs.text:
exit
Terminate connection to story matrix and return to main terminal.

docs.title: READ Options
docs.text:
• read list - Show all available chapters
  • read search <term> - Search chapters by content
  • read by <character> - Filter chapters by character

docs.title: CHARACTER Options
docs.text:
• character list - Show all characters
  • character info <name> - Get detailed character information
  • character relations <name> - View character relationships

docs.title: SWAY Options
docs.text:
• sway list - View active sway points
  • sway status - Check sway influence level
  • sway history - View past sway attempts

docs.title: Best Practices
docs.text:
1. Using ASK
  2. Be specific in your questions
  3. Reference story elements
  4. Use character names

  5. Mention locations and events

  6. Reading Stories

  7. Start with read latest for current context
  8. Use read first for complete experience

  9. Check character info before reading

  10. Character Interaction

  11. Review character backgrounds
  12. Note relationship dynamics

  13. Track character development

  14. SWAY System

  15. Consider character motivations
  16. Align with story context
  17. Be subtle in influence attempts
  18. Monitor sway impact

docs.title: StoryForge 命令
docs.text: StoryForge 提供了一系列专门用于与故事矩阵交互的命令。每个命令都旨在让您控制叙事体验的不同方面。

docs.title: ASK
docs.text:
ask <你的问题>
直接神经连接到 DAEMON 的量子意识。使用此命令可以： - 获取故事信息 - 理解角色动机 - 了解故事机制 - 接收故事方向的指导

docs.title: CHARACTER
docs.text:
character
访问角色数据库以： - 查看故事中的所有角色 - 查看角色关系 - 检查角色背景 - 监控角色发展

docs.title: READ
docs.text:
read [chapter_id]
read first
read latest
访问和阅读故事章节： - 不带参数的 read 显示可用章节 - read <id> 打开特定章节 - read first 从头开始 - read latest 显示最新章节

docs.title: SWAY
docs.text:
sway
访问故事矩阵操作协议： - 影响角色决策 - 建议情节发展 - 影响故事方向 - 创建叙事分支

docs.title: EXIT
docs.text:
exit
终止与故事矩阵的连接并返回主终端。

docs.title: READ 选项
docs.text:
• read list - 显示所有可用章节
  • read search <term> - 按内容搜索章节
  • read by <character> - 按角色筛选章节

docs.title: CHARACTER 选项
docs.text:
• character list - 显示所有角色
  • character info <n> - 获取详细的角色信息
  • character relations <n> - 查看角色关系

docs.title: SWAY 选项
docs.text:
• sway list - 查看活跃的 sway 点数
  • sway status - 检查 sway 影响力等级
  • sway history - 查看过去的 sway 尝试

docs.title: 最佳实践
docs.text:
1. 使用 ASK
  2. 问题要具体
  3. 引用故事元素
  4. 使用角色名称

  5. 提及地点和事件

  6. 阅读故事

  7. 使用 read latest 获取当前上下文
  8. 使用 read first 获得完整体验

  9. 阅读前查看角色信息

  10. 角色互动

  11. 回顾角色背景
  12. 注意关系动态

  13. 追踪角色发展

  14. SWAY 系统

  15. 考虑角色动机
  16. 与故事上下文保持一致
  17. 影响要微妙
  18. 监控 sway 影响

docs.title: AI-Driven Narrative Generation
docs.text: Stories in Terminal Story are dynamically generated by our advanced AI system, which manages:

docs.title: Story Pacing & Structure
docs.text:
• AI calculates optimal story length and pacing
  • Automatically divides content into readable chapters
  • Balances character development with plot progression
  • Creates natural story arcs and tension points

docs.title: Character Development System
docs.text:
Characters evolve through a sophisticated cycle:

1. Think: Characters process current events and situations 2. Reflect: They consider past experiences and memories 3. Learn: Characters grow from their experiences 4. Adapt: Personality and behavior evolve based on events 5. Improve: Characters develop new traits and capabilities

docs.title: Narrative Flow Process1. Initial Character Thoughts2. Narrator's Processing3. Final Character Responses
docs.text: 1. Characters process current events and context 2. They consider their previous experiences and memories 3. Initial thoughts provide foundation for narration 4. These thoughts remain internal to the system ↓ 1. Integrates all character initial thoughts 2. Considers character responses and reactions 3. Incorporates previous events and scene context 4. Processes character memories and relationships 5. Accounts for any accepted influence attempts (sways) 6. Creates a cohesive narrative from all perspectives ↓ 1. Characters react to the narrator's telling 2. Final thoughts incorporate: a. Their initial reactions b. The narrator's perspective c. Character traits and skills d. Previous experiences 3. These responses appear on the reading page

docs.title: Dynamic Story Elements
docs.text:
• Character relationships evolve naturally
  • Plot adapts to character decisions
  • World building expands with story progression
  • Subplots emerge from character interactions

docs.title: Navigation
docs.text:
• Use arrow keys or buttons to navigate chapters
  • Access character information while reading
  • View relationship updates and character growth
  • Track story progress and development

docs.title: Story Progression
docs.text:
1. Each chapter is carefully crafted by the AI
  2. Character thoughts and reflections are woven into the narrative
  3. Story adapts to the pace of character development
  4. Multiple plot threads are maintained consistently

docs.title: Memory Integration
docs.text:
• Characters remember past events and reference them
  • Relationships evolve based on shared experiences
  • Character growth is reflected in their dialogue and actions
  • Past decisions influence future story developments

docs.title: Character Evolution
docs.text:
• Characters learn from their experiences
  • Personality traits develop over time
  • Relationships deepen or change
  • New abilities and knowledge are gained

docs.title: Story Adaptation
docs.text:
• Plot adjusts to character growth
  • New story elements emerge organically
  • World expands with character exploration
  • Subplots develop based on character interactions

docs.title: Automatic Narration
docs.text: Terminal Story features an Audible-like narration system that brings the story to life:

docs.title: Chapter Narration
docs.text:
• Professional male narrator voice reads the main story content
  • Clear, consistent narration enhances the reading experience
  • Audio controls for play/pause and volume adjustment
  • Seamless audio playback directly in the interface

docs.title: Character Voices
docs.text:
• Each character has a unique voice that matches their gender and personality
  • Character thoughts and dialogue are voiced by their assigned narrator
  • Voices remain consistent throughout the story
  • Natural, expressive speech brings characters to life

docs.title: Audio Controls
docs.text:
• Simple play/pause button for each audio segment
  • Volume slider for comfortable listening
  • Audio automatically stops when navigating away
  • Mobile-friendly audio controls

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
1. Look for the speaker icon next to chapters and character thoughts
  2. Click to play/pause the narration
  3. Use the volume slider to adjust audio level
  4. Audio will automatically pause when another segment is played

docs.title: Reading Tips
docs.text:
1. Pay attention to character reflections
  2. Notice how characters reference past events
  3. Track relationship changes
  4. Observe character growth patterns
  5. Follow subplot developments

docs.title: AI 驱动的叙事生成
docs.text: Terminal Story 中的故事由我们的高级 AI 系统动态生成，该系统管理：

docs.title: 故事节奏与结构
docs.text:
• AI 计算最佳故事长度和节奏
  • 自动将内容分为可读章节
  • 平衡角色发展与情节推进
  • 创造自然的故事弧线和紧张点

docs.title: 角色发展系统
docs.text:
角色通过复杂的循环进行演变：

1. 思考：角色处理当前事件和情况 2. 反思：他们考虑过去的经历和记忆 3. 学习：角色从经历中成长 4. 适应：性格和行为根据事件演变 5. 提升：角色发展新特征和能力

docs.title: 叙事流程
docs.text:
故事生成遵循结构化流程：

  1. 初始角色思考
  2. 角色处理当前事件和上下文
  3. 他们考虑过去的经历和记忆
  4. 初始思考为叙述提供基础

  5. 这些思考保持在系统内部

  6. 叙述者处理

  7. 整合所有角色的初始思考
  8. 考虑角色的反应和回应
  9. 融入过去的事件和场景上下文
  10. 处理角色记忆和关系
  11. 考虑任何已接受的影响尝试（sways）

  12. 从所有视角创造连贯的叙事

  13. 最终角色回应

  14. 角色对叙述者的讲述做出反应
  15. 最终思考包含：
    • 他们的初始反应
    • 叙述者的视角
    • 角色特质和技能
    • 过去的经历
  16. 这些回应显示在阅读页面上

docs.title: 动态故事元素
docs.text:
• 角色关系自然演变
  • 情节适应角色决策
  • 世界构建随故事推进而扩展
  • 子情节从角色互动中产生

docs.title: 导航
docs.text:
• 使用方向键或按钮导航章节
  • 阅读时访问角色信息
  • 查看关系更新和角色成长
  • 追踪故事进展和发展

docs.title: 故事推进
docs.text:
1. 每个章节都由 AI 精心制作
  2. 角色思考和反思融入叙事
  3. 故事适应角色发展的节奏
  4. 多条情节线索保持一致性

docs.title: 记忆整合
docs.text:
• 角色记住过去事件并引用它们
  • 关系基于共同经历而演变
  • 角色成长反映在对话和行动中
  • 过去的决定影响未来故事发展

docs.title: 角色演变
docs.text:
• 角色从经历中学习
  • 个性特征随时间发展
  • 关系加深或改变
  • 获得新能力和知识

docs.title: 故事适应
docs.text:
• 情节根据角色成长调整
  • 新故事元素自然产生
  • 世界随角色探索扩展
  • 子情节基于角色互动发展

docs.title: 自动叙述
docs.text: Terminal Story 具有类似 Audible 的叙述系统，让故事栩栩如生：

docs.title: 章节叙述
docs.text:
• 专业男性叙述者朗读主要故事内容
  • 清晰、一致的叙述增强阅读体验
  • 播放/暂停和音量调节的音频控制
  • 界面中无缝音频播放

docs.title: 角色声音
docs.text:
• 每个角色都有与其性别和个性相匹配的独特声音
  • 角色思考和对话由其指定的叙述者配音
  • 声音在整个故事中保持一致
  • 自然、富有表现力的语音让角色栩栩如生

docs.title: 音频控制
docs.text:
• 每个音频片段的简单播放/暂停按钮
  • 音量滑块实现舒适聆听
  • 导航离开时自动停止音频
  • 移动设备友好的音频控制

docs.title: 使用方法
docs.text:
1. 查找章节和角色思考旁边的扬声器图标
  2. 点击播放/暂停叙述
  3. 使用音量滑块调节音频级别
  4. 播放另一个片段时音频会自动暂停

docs.title: 阅读技巧
docs.text:
1. 注意角色的反思
  2. 留意角色如何引用过去事件
  3. 追踪关系变化
  4. 观察角色成长模式
  5. 关注子情节发展

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: The SWAY system is an advanced narrative influence mechanism that allows readers to subtly shape the story's direction. It operates through: - Character influence - Plot suggestions - World development - Relationship dynamics

docs.title: Influence Mechanics
docs.text: SWAY operates by: - Analyzing character states - Evaluating plot possibilities - Calculating influence probability - Measuring impact potential - Implementing subtle changes

docs.title: Impact Types
docs.text:
1. Direct Character Influence
  2. Suggest actions
  3. Propose decisions
  4. Shape reactions

  5. Guide development

  6. Plot Development

  7. Introduce story elements
  8. Suggest plot twists
  9. Create opportunities

  10. Shape narrative direction

  11. World Building

  12. Expand locations
  13. Develop background
  14. Add environmental elements
  15. Enhance atmosphere

docs.title: Best Practices
docs.text:
1. Understanding Characters
  2. Know their motivations
  3. Consider their history
  4. Respect their personality

  5. Account for relationships

  6. Plot Awareness

  7. Follow current storylines
  8. Consider consequences
  9. Maintain consistency

  10. Think long-term

  11. Timing

  12. Choose key moments
  13. Wait for opportunities
  14. Consider pacing
  15. Allow natural development

docs.title: Impact Measurement
docs.text: The system tracks: - Influence success rate - Character receptivity - Plot integration - Story coherence - Long-term effects

docs.title: Character Response
docs.text: Characters may: - Accept influence - Modify suggestions - Reject proposals - Adapt partially - Create alternatives

docs.title: Story Integration
docs.text: SWAY ensures: - Natural plot flow - Character consistency - World coherence - Realistic development - Meaningful impact

docs.title: Effective Influence
docs.text:
1. Be subtle
  2. Stay in character
  3. Consider context
  4. Think long-term
  5. Respect story logic

docs.title: Common Pitfalls
docs.text:
• Forcing changes
  • Ignoring character traits
  • Rushing development
  • Overlooking consequences
  • Breaking immersion

docs.title: Boundaries
docs.text: SWAY won't allow: - Character breaking changes - Plot-destroying elements - Unrealistic developments - Forced outcomes - Immersion-breaking changes

docs.title: 概述
docs.text: SWAY 系统是一种高级叙事影响机制，允许读者微妙地塑造故事的方向。它通过以下方式运作： - 角色影响 - 情节建议 - 世界发展 - 关系动态

docs.title: 影响机制
docs.text: SWAY 通过以下方式运作： - 分析角色状态 - 评估情节可能性 - 计算影响概率 - 衡量影响潜力 - 实施微妙的改变

docs.title: 影响类型
docs.text:
1. 直接角色影响
  2. 建议行动
  3. 提出决策
  4. 塑造反应

  5. 引导发展

  6. 情节发展

  7. 引入故事元素
  8. 建议情节转折
  9. 创造机会

  10. 塑造叙事方向

  11. 世界构建

  12. 扩展地点
  13. 发展背景
  14. 添加环境元素
  15. 增强氛围

docs.title: 最佳实践
docs.text:
1. 理解角色
  2. 了解他们的动机
  3. 考虑他们的历史
  4. 尊重他们的个性

  5. 考虑关系

  6. 情节意识

  7. 关注当前故事线
  8. 考虑后果
  9. 保持一致性

  10. 长远思考

  11. 时机

  12. 选择关键时刻
  13. 等待机会
  14. 考虑节奏
  15. 允许自然发展

docs.title: 影响测量
docs.text: 系统追踪： - 影响成功率 - 角色接受度 - 情节整合 - 故事连贯性 - 长期效果

docs.title: 角色回应
docs.text: 角色可能： - 接受影响 - 修改建议 - 拒绝提议 - 部分适应 - 创造替代方案

docs.title: 故事整合
docs.text: SWAY 确保： - 自然的情节流动 - 角色一致性 - 世界连贯性 - 现实的发展 - 有意义的影响

docs.title: 有效影响
docs.text:
1. 保持微妙
  2. 符合角色特性
  3. 考虑上下文
  4. 长远思考
  5. 尊重故事逻辑

docs.title: 常见陷阱
docs.text:
• 强制改变
  • 忽视角色特征
  • 匆忙发展
  • 忽视后果
  • 破坏沉浸感

docs.title: 边界
docs.text: SWAY 不允许： - 破坏角色的改变 - 破坏情节的元素 - 不现实的发展 - 强制性结果 - 破坏沉浸感的改变

docs.title: Basic Navigation
docs.text:
• cd - Change directory
  • cd .. - Go back to previous directory
  • cd ~ - Return to home directory
  • ls - List contents of current directory
  • pwd - Print working directory

docs.title: Special Directories
docs.text:
• cd socials - Access social media links
  • cd misc - Access miscellaneous commands and utilities

docs.title: Examples
docs.text:
# Navigate to socials directory
cd socials

# Return to previous directory
cd ..

# List contents of current directory
ls

# Show current directory path
pwd

docs.title: 基本导航
docs.text:
• cd - 更改目录
  • cd .. - 返回上一级目录
  • cd ~ - 返回主目录
  • ls - 列出当前目录内容
  • pwd - 显示当前工作目录

docs.title: 特殊目录
docs.text:
• cd socials - 访问社交媒体链接
  • cd misc - 访问杂项命令和工具

docs.title: 示例
docs.text:
# 导航到社交目录
cd socials

# 返回上一级目录
cd ..

# 列出当前目录内容
ls

# 显示当前目录路径
pwd

docs.title: Accessing Social Links
docs.text:
Navigate to the socials directory to access social media links: 

cd socials

docs.title: Available Commands
docs.text:
• twitter - Visit Terminal Story on Twitter
  • discord - Join the Terminal Story Discord community

docs.title: Navigation
docs.text:
• Use cd .. to return to the main directory
  • Use ls to view available social links

docs.title: Examples
docs.text:
# Navigate to socials
cd socials

# List available social links
ls

# Visit Discord
discord

# Return to main directory
cd ..

docs.title: 访问社交链接
docs.text:
导航到社交目录以访问社交媒体链接： 

cd socials

docs.title: 可用命令
docs.text:
• twitter - 访问 Terminal Story 的 Twitter
  • discord - 加入 Terminal Story Discord 社区

docs.title: 导航
docs.text:
• 使用 cd .. 返回主目录
  • 使用 ls 查看可用的社交链接

docs.title: 示例
docs.text:
# 导航到社交目录
cd socials

# 列出可用的社交链接
ls

# 访问 Discord
discord

# 返回主目录
cd ..

docs.title: Time and Date
docs.text:
• time - Display current time
  • date - Display current date
  • weather - Show current weather information

docs.title: System Information
docs.text:
• clear - Clear terminal screen
  • echo [text] - Print text to terminal

docs.title: Examples
docs.text:
# Display current time
time

# Show weather information
weather

# Clear terminal screen
clear

# Echo text
echo "Hello, DAEMON!"

docs.title: Notes
docs.text:
• Weather information requires location access
  • Time and date are displayed in your local timezone

docs.title: 时间和日期
docs.text:
• time - 显示当前时间
  • date - 显示当前日期
  • weather - 显示当前天气信息

docs.title: 系统信息
docs.text:
• clear - 清除终端屏幕
  • echo [text] - 在终端打印文本

docs.title: 示例
docs.text:
# 显示当前时间
time

# 显示天气信息
weather

# 清除终端屏幕
clear

# 打印文本
echo "你好，DAEMON！"

docs.title: 注意事项
docs.text:
• 天气信息需要位置访问权限
  • 时间和日期显示为您的本地时区

docs.title: Terminal Story 文档
docs.text: 欢迎来到 Terminal Story 文档。本指南将帮助您浏览这个赛博朋克主题的互动故事平台。

docs.title: 🌟 即将推出：国际化扩展
docs.text:
我们很高兴地宣布 Terminal Story 正在走向全球！在接下来的3周内，我们将推出： - 完整的中文语言支持 - 自动中文翻译 - 互动中文聊天功能 - 中文命令行界面

这仅仅是开始 - 未来我们将陆续支持更多语言。

docs.title: 技术框架
docs.text: Terminal Story 建立在我们专有的框架之上，与 ElizaOS 和 SWARMs 一起在 AI 代理生态系统中占据重要地位。虽然受到 LangChain 的启发，但我们开发了自己的综合系统：

docs.title: 高级内存架构
docs.text:
• 多重记忆系统：实现一致性、自我个性化的 AI 代理
  • 动态内存管理：结合短期和长期记忆
  • 基于影响力的存储：根据重要性存储和检索记忆
  • 时间衰减集成：自然记忆衰退模拟
  • 创造力专精：代理发展独特的创造力优势

我们用于创建多重记忆一致性 AI 代理的框架即将发布，为开发者提供构建复杂的、个性化 AI 代理的工具，具备： - 自我进化的个性 - 动态响应模式 - 智能记忆查询 - 基于影响力的记忆存储 - 时间性记忆管理

docs.title: 快速开始
docs.text:
1. 访问 Terminal Story
  2. 使用 help 命令查看可用选项
  3. 输入 storyforge 开始您的旅程

docs.title: 文档结构
docs.text:
• 入门指南
  • 故事工坊
  • 网络系统
  • 守护进程接口

docs.title: 需要帮助？
docs.text: 在 Terminal Story 中使用 ASK 命令获取 DAEMON 的直接帮助。

docs.title: DAEMON 界面
docs.text:
• 概述
  • 最佳实践

docs.title: Terminal Story 入门指南
docs.text: Terminal Story 是一个独特的互动写作平台，它将经典的终端界面与现代 AI 讲故事相结合。这个赛博朋克主题的平台让您能够参与故事创作，同时保持命令行界面的美感。

docs.title: 主要特点
docs.text:
• 命令行界面：一种怀旧而强大的故事交互方式
  • AI驱动的 DAEMON：帮助指导您故事体验的智能系统
  • 多重环境：用于写作的故事工坊，用于社区互动的网络系统
  • 移动设备支持：在桌面和移动设备上都能完整运行

docs.title: 第一步
docs.text:
1. 熟悉命令
  2. 使用 help 查看可用命令
  3. 尝试基本导航命令

  4. 体验界面功能

  5. 进入故事工坊

  6. 输入 storyforge 进入故事矩阵
  7. 再次使用 help 查看故事工坊特定命令

  8. 尝试使用 read latest 查看最新章节

  9. 与 DAEMON 连接

  10. 使用 ask 命令与 DAEMON 交流
  11. 从简单的系统问题开始

  12. 逐步过渡到故事相关的查询

  13. 探索网络系统

  14. 输入 cybernet 访问社区空间
  15. 使用 list 列出可用房间
  16. 加入关于正在进行的故事的讨论

docs.title: 下一步
docs.text:
• 查看主要命令获取详细的命令信息
  • 了解基本导航获取界面使用技巧
  • 深入故事工坊进行故事互动

  • discord - 加入 Terminal Story Discord 社区
